name: DevonGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Devon Guide”
”Recommend an attraction”
”coffee, dinner, lunch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: devon guide
des:
Would you like to visit this historical town called Devon in the suburbs of Philadelphia in Pennsylvania? Here's a skill that will help you out in planning your trip to Devon.. 

Looking for a place to eat or to have nice warm coffee in or around Devon.. Ask Alexa!

What started as a one-day event in 1896 as a local effort to improve horsemanship and breeding for Philadelphians who lived along the Pennsylvania Railroad’s Harrison Branch, otherwise known as “The Main Line,” is now a time-honored tradition. The Devon Horse Show and Country Fair, a 10-day event, attracts horse lovers from around the world.

Read more: http://www.visitphilly.com/events/philadelphia/devon-horse-show-and-country-fair/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
